name: Panaceia
description:
Panacea is an adventure that goes in the mind of a boy, that, with the help of a psychologist tries to find a lost desire to play, due to the bullying suffered by him.

Controls: 

Movement : WASD,Arrows, Gamepad AnalogStick, Dpad.

Interact:  Key"I", Gamepad Button"A".

Attack: Key "J" ,"K" ,"L", - Gamepad Buttons"X" "Y" "B"

Radar: Key "Spacebar" - Gamepad Buttons(RB).
